title: FAB LOC Near USF, St. Mary's Hosp, GG Park* Pkg avail*Very Large
posting_body: ****AVAIL Now****
Large 1BD/1Bath in a SUPER LOCATION, BRIGHT and LOVELY OUTLOOK.

Near USF; 2 blks from GG Park entrance; 1 blk either direction to 2 main bus lines to downtown; across the street from ROSSI PARK/PLAYGROUND which has a public swimming and tennis courts; walk to restaurants and shopping in this great neighborhood.
Squeaky clean.
Freshly painted, HARDWOOD FLOORS, vertical blinds and a newer building.
It has a modern kitchen with garbage disposal & dishwasher.
Large living room/dining room combo that is FULL OF LIGHT with a wall of windows but the trees make it private.
LOTS OF CLOSET SPACE Master bedroom has an xtra large walk-in closet, and there is an additional very large closet in the hallway.
Central vacuum system in the unit, a washer/dryer in the garage area, and this is an ELEVATOR BLDG.
One space pkg in the large garage is available.
VERY WELL MAINTAINED BLDG.
A GREAT VALUE and quality for this price!
